stories.title: Add New Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a task with a title so that I can capture my to-do items.

stories.title: Set Task Due Date
stories.description: As a user, I want to set a due date for tasks so that I can track deadlines.

stories.title: Assign Task Priority
stories.description: As a user, I want to assign high/medium/low priority to tasks so that I can focus on what matters most.

stories.title: Mark Task Complete
stories.description: As a user, I want to mark tasks as complete so that I can track my progress.

stories.title: Delete Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete tasks so that I can remove unwanted or completed items.

stories.title: Filter by Priority
stories.description: As a user, I want to filter tasks by priority level so that I can see only high/medium/low items.

stories.title: Sort by Due Date
stories.description: As a user, I want to sort tasks by due date so that I can see upcoming deadlines first.

stories.title: View Task List
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my list of tasks so that I can see all my to-dos at a glance.

summary: A todo list app enabling users to manage tasks with due dates and priority levels, featuring core actions like add, complete, delete, filter, and sort.
